name: Spiderpunk (Kita the Creator)
description:
Welcome to SpiderPunk a very cool and playable game...

          In this game that your main quest is to protect the six spider eggs, however, the spider is slow and can't protect each egg from all enemies, but can place three webs through the map that can restrict and slow enemies, you may use your webs and brain to create an strategy to protect as eggs as possible resulting in several approaches for the same enemies...

          There's a giant cloud of graphite creating graphite eggbreaker monsters led by a can of eggbreaker paint, and now you're the only one who can clear the graphite clouds with your neon and save spider eggs by venturing into caves, forests , cities and mountains, but you are the only one who can decide the future of this world...

          This game has a "ranking" mode where your objective is to accumulate as many points as possible, so that you can break your records and those of your friends too, not that it's something revolutionary or something, but it's cool...

          That's it, thanks for reading, playing and having fun!
